message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $95. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $85. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $85 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $90. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product for you.  Let's try to make this work!
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $87.50? I'm willing to compromise to make this work.
